entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High 6 except minus 1 near the Nunavut border.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning then changing to rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow near the Nunavut border. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm near the Nunavut border. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 6 except minus 1 near the Nunavut border. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
